item.description:
The Coalition's 5th Annual Bark in the Park will be held Aug. 5th from 11am to 4pm at Kennedy Park in Fall River.

A microchipping and a rabies clinic by Mass Mobile Vet.

There will be an agility demo, obedience class by Paul Hankins and a Hawaiian Luau style Pit bull Musical with Little Rhodie Bully Breed Club!!

Goodie bags and free samples will be available.

There will be also be vendors and local rescues. Maybe you will find the perfect addition to the family :)

And the ever popular doggie fun run is back again this year.($1 per run)

If you are interested in volunteering or space rental, please contact Tammy at 774-218-8139


====================================================

Kennedy Park (originally known as South Park) is a 57-acre (23 ha) historic park located in Fall River, Massachusetts. It is bounded by South Main Street, Bradford Avenue, Middle, and Bay Streets in the southern part of the city. The area of the city where the park is located was until 1862, part of Rhode Island.
item.name: BARK IN THE PARK
